data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Ngaraard, Palau.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ngaraard, Palau

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Ngaraard that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Ngaraard you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Ngaraard.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ulimang
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ulimang, Ngaraard, Palau.
Please, teach the 111 believers in Ngaraard, Palau how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Ngaraard, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ngaraard, Palau has a population of 500.

We estimate Ngaraard has 111 people who might know Jesus, 368 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 111 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
